name: Fighting Despair
description:
This is a game that I have made for a solo game development project. The idea of this game is to neutralize negative thoughts that one may have of them self while having fun at the same time. In this game you want to destroy the negative thoughts that are coming down on you and catch the positive ones. This is an idea I had and thought it was cool so I decided to go with it.

Controls For Right now

'A' move to left

'D' move to right

'Space' Shoot

'R' Restart level

'Esc' Main Menu
